name: StoneScissorsPaper
description:
StoneScissorsPaper simple game in which you need to win disputes with your opponents. Stone defeats Scissors, Scissors defeat Paper, Paper defeats Stone.

Your task is to see what kind of object the enemy has over his head and pick up the right item to defeat him. The player himself can keep only one item, so it's worth moving around the map correctly and choosing the right strategy.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

E - Pick up / Throw

The project was created by

Rebonnn - Nikita.
